reviewText: I just love this movie.  It is funny as heck and I have watched it over and over.  Even my wife liked it!  The action is great and it is just flat out entertaining.  Well, the opening is not very good, but it just gets better from there.

I will rate this movie 5 stars, but the audio is Mandarin not Cantonese. This makes me angry.
Why don't you keep the original audio in Cantonese?

Really excellent comedy horror, well acted , big english subtitles  not fast so you can enjoy film, lam ching ying excellent as always, part of the mr vampires spin off  fun for all the family very funny,  would recommend it , you, ll enjoy it
Because I am a big fan of horror/monster movies. Especially asian movies, there great and I recommend buying them all.

How can any one film combine martial arts, vampires, demon possession, East/West religious battles and debates about western underwear? Well, this one tries to! Don't let the three star rating undersell you -- it's a very fun, and a very funny movie. Battling vampires in a haunted church with neon crucifixes is always a good time! The fight scenes are outrageous, the demons are by turns pathetic and hilarious, and the WTF ending will have you asking, "Sequel?" Plus, the DVD comes with a free Exorcist Master t-shirt! Or, at least, mine did. Be the first on your block...this movie is sure to enliven any movie-night get-together with your friends. My buddies and I had a blast with it.
